definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)

sentences.english: He is a gluttonous and lazy guy.
But the "puritans" were in dead earnest.
sentences.chinese: 但是“純粹教旨徒”對教旨有着死的真誠。

sentences.english: What is the meaning of the reflected in the architectural design of free-hand?
sentences.chinese: 徒手錶現在建築設計中的意義何在？

sentences.english: Two people therefore painstakingly entangle martial arts world master, Jia Wudao consented finally receives for the person.
sentences.chinese: 二人於是苦纏武林高手，賈武刀終答允收爲徒。

sentences.english: For such are false apostles, deceitful workers, transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 那等人是假使徒，行事詭詐，裝作基督使徒的模樣。

sentences.english: He had a very high midi-chlorian count in his bloodstream, prompting Jinn to take him as an apprentice.
sentences.chinese: 其血流中的纖原體數目很高，促使金收他爲徒。

sentences.english: For an adventure in the jungle, consider trekking in northern Thailand. As you trek, you walk in the mountains and pass rivers and waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想參與叢林冒險，可以考慮泰北的徒涉險之旅。

sentences.english: Early incarnations of Lando described him as a slick, riverboat gambler type.
sentences.chinese: 蘭多早期的形象被描繪成一個圓滑的船上貝者徒類型。

sentences.english: The non-Jains also express high reverence for this Jain festival.
sentences.chinese: 非耆那教徒也表達了對耆那教盛典的很高的崇敬。

sentences.english: Sikhs also mark the anniversaries of the passing of their religion's gurus.
sentences.chinese: 錫克教徒也紀念他們的宗教大師逝世週年。

sentences.english: The festival ordains the Jains to observe the ten universal supreme virtues in daily practical life.
sentences.chinese: 盛典命令耆那教徒日常遵守十大美德。

sentences.english: For the first time, a Native American was named a saint.
sentences.chinese: 第一次，一位當地美國人被封爲聖徒。

sentences.english: The four seasons is only a powder.
You must avoid loquacity and the man-eating person, they only annoyed.
sentences.chinese: 你要避開好辯和兇悍的人，他們徒惹煩惱。

sentences.english: I ought to pray first for all believers and then for those around me.
sentences.chinese: 我應當先爲衆信徒禱告，然後再爲我周圍的人禱告。

sentences.english: From year to year the Saracen section also deteriorates more and more.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭教徒地區也逐年越來越惡化。

definition: to lecture on doctrine/to expound the wisdom of ancient sages/to preach/a sermon
to die for a just cause
paraphernalia of a guard of honor
to perform one's job/attendant/job/duties/(respectful appellation for the addressee) you/your Excellency/(Church) deacon
